description: This dataset describes the total volume annually of Import and Export Bulk cargo moved through maritime terminals located within Port Authority property in the Port of New York and New Jersey in metric tons

metadata.attribution: Port Authority of NY & NJ, Port Commerce Department
metadata.description: This dataset describes the total volume annually of Import and Export Bulk cargo moved through maritime terminals located within Port Authority property in the Port of New York and New Jersey in metric tons

name: Bulk Cargo Annual Imports and Exports Through Port Authority of NY NJ Maritime Terminals:  Beginning 2000
